text: Ildikó Pécsi (21 May 1940 – 5 December 2020) was a Hungarian actress and politician. She appeared in more than one hundred movies from 1961 until 2008. She was a member of the National Assembly between 1994 and 1998. Pécsi was known for her roles in Tales of a Long Journey, A Strange Role and in Just like Home. Pécsi died on 5 December 2020 in Budapest at the age of 80.Meghalt Pécsi Ildikó ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Hungarian movie actors Category:Hungarian politicians
title: Ildikó Pécsi
